わき役: (わきやく) - supporting role (actor); minor role
わき目: (わきめ) - looking aside; (from the) eyes of an onlooker
わき目も振らずに: (わきめもふらずに) - without looking aside; looking neither right nor left; wholeheartedly
わき道: (わきみち) - side road; byroad; digression
わけが無い: (わけがない) - there is no way that ... (expresses speaker's belief that something is impossible); easy/simple
わけでは無い: (わけではない) - it does not mean that ...; I don't mean that ...; it is not the case that...
わけには行かない: (わけにはいかない) - impossible to do (although wants to); cannot afford to; must not; no way we can
わけ知り顔: (わけしりがお) - know-it-all airs; I-know-how-it-is look
わけ隔て: (わけへだて) - distinction; favoritism; favouritism; discrimination
わさび漬け: (わさびづけ) - pickled Japanese horseradish; wasabi cut up and mixed with sake lees
わさび菜: (わさびな) - wasabi greens; wasabi leaves
わさび醤油: (わさびじょうゆ) - soy sauce flavoured with grated wasabi (used for sashimi, etc.)
わさわさ: (わさわさ) - restless; fidgety; lively; busy
わしわし: (わしわし) - many people talking noisily; chowing down/scarfing down; roughly (of actions)
わず: (わず) - (ワズ only) was; (esp. in Twitter) was just in/just left/just did
わたし的: (わたしてき) - (often わたし的には)  my style; my way; my opinion
わちゃわちゃ: (わちゃわちゃ) - chattering; chit-chat; (ladies) prattle
わっ: (ワッ) - boo! (sound used to scare someone); ugh (dissatisfaction, aggravation); ulp (consternation)
わっと: (わっと) - suddenly and in a loud voice (e.g. sobbing)
わなわな: (wanawana) - tremendo de medo, tremendo por todo o corpo
わな猟: (わなりょう) - animal trapping; hunting with traps
わね: (わね) - expresses depth of feeling or emphasis (sentence end)
わめき散らす: (わめきちらす) - to rant and rave; to raise hell
わや: (わや) - fiasco; debacle; disaster; train wreck
わらじを脱ぐ: (わらじをぬぐ) - to complete one's journey
わらび粉: (わらびこ) - bracken starch (starch produced from the rhizomes of bracken)
わらび糊: (わらびのり) - type of glue produced from bracken starch
わらび餅: (わらびもち) - bracken-starch dumpling; type of dumpling traditionally made using bracken starch
わらべ唄: (わらべうた) - children's song; nursery song
わらべ歌: (わらべうた) - children's song; nursery song
わらわら: (ワラワラ) - bustling; shuffling; squirming; creepy crawly
わら人形: (わらにんぎょう) - straw doll or figure; straw effigy
わら紙: (わらがみ) - straw paper; rice paper
わら細工: (わらざいく) - straw work; straw craft
わり込む: (わりこむ) - to cut in; to thrust oneself into; to wedge oneself in; to muscle in on; to interrupt; to disturb
われと思わんもの: (われとおもわんもの) - those confident in themselves
われと思わん者: (われとおもわんもの) - those confident in themselves
われめちゃん: (われめちゃん) - vulva; slit; cunt; vagina; twat
われを忘れる: (われをわすれる) - to forget oneself; to lose control of oneself
われ勝ち: (われがち) - (usu. as 我勝ちに) everybody for himself; everyone for themselves
われ知らず: (われしらず) - involuntarily; instinctively; without realizing
われ鐘のような声: (われがねのようなこえ) - resounding voice; thunderous voice
わわ菜: (わわさい) - baby Chinese cabbage (chi: wá wá cài); wawasai cabbage; variety of small Chinese cabbage
わんさ: (わんさか) - in swarms; in great crowds
わんさか: (わんさか) - in swarms; in great crowds
わんさガール: (わんさガール) - small-part actress; female extras
わんぱく盛り: (わんぱくざかり) - (at the) peak of mischievousness; little demon (of children)
わんわん: (わんわん) - bow-wow (barking sound)/arf arf/woof/bark; waah-waah (crying sound); clamouring/clamoring/echoing; a bow-wow (i.e. a dog)/doggy
をして: (をして) - indicates patient of a causative expression
をば: (をば) - marks object of action, etc. (also adds emphasis)
をも: (をも) - (emphatic version of object-indicating particle を)  even
を介して: (をかいして) - using as an intermediary; through
を元として: (をもととして) - based on; built on; made from
を元にして: (をもとにして) - based on; built on; made from
を回って: (をめぐって) - in regard to; concerning (usu. of disputes)
を基として: (をもととして) - based on; built on; made from
を基にして: (をもとにして) - based on; built on; made from
を巡って: (をめぐって) - in regard to; concerning (usu. of disputes)
を廻って: (をめぐって) - in regard to; concerning (usu. of disputes)
を措いて: (をおいて) - other than; excluding; without
を通して: (をとおして) - through; throughout; through (the good offices of); by way of
を限りに: (をかぎりに) - as of the end of (today, this month, etc.); to make (today, etc.) the last (day)
ん: (ん) - some (at the start of a number in place of a digit)
んず: (うず) - will probably be; intending to/will; should
んだ: (んだ) - the expectation is that ...; the reason is that ...; the fact is that ...; it is that ...
んで: (んで) - that being the case; because of ...; the reason is ....; given that...
んです: (んだ) - the expectation is that ...; the reason is that ...; the fact is that ...; it is that ...
んとす: (むとす) - (after a -nai stem) to be trying to; to be just about to
んとする: (むとす) - (after a -nai stem) to be trying to; to be just about to
んと欲す: (んとほっす) - to endeavor to (connects to -nai stem)
んな: (んな) - such (about the actions of the listener, or about ideas expressed or understood by the listener); like that; that sort of
ゝ: (くりかえし) - repetition mark in hiragana
